verbs.description: devocalize (third-person singular simple present devocalizes, present participle devocalizing, simple past and past participle devocalized)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To make toneless; to deprive of vowel quality.
examples: If we take a high vowel  […]  and devocalize it, we obtain a hiss  […]

entries.meaning: (transitive) To reduce the volume of the vocalizations of (an animal) by surgically removing tissue from its vocal cords.
